catalog.description: vCloud Air Catalog (default is Public Catalog)

catalogitem.description: vCloud Air Catalog Item (default is Ubuntu Precise)

computeid.description: vCloud Air Compute ID (if using Dedicated Cloud)

edgegateway.description: vCloud Air Org Edge Gateway (Default is <vdcid>)

memorySize.description: vCloud Air VM Memory Size in MB (default 2048)

orgvdcnetwork.description: vCloud Air Org VDC Network (Default is <vdcid>-default-routed)

provision.description: vCloud Air Install Docker binaries (default is true)

publicip.description: vCloud Air Org Public IP to use
